name: Constitution of Elysium
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every specialist [in this city]
Gain a free [Stele of Constitution] [in this city]
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
quote: The sovereignty of Elysium resides in the people,nand all political power emanates from the people.n- Article 2, Constitution of Elysium

civilopediaText.text: The sovereignty of Elysium resides in the people,nand all political power emanates from the people.

name: Parliament
uniques: [-50]% unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities connected to capital]
Only available <if [Search for Survivors] is constructed>
Can only be built <in in capital cities>
Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Stele of Constitution
uniques: Can only be built <in in all cities connected to capital>
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: This grand monument has the entire Constitution of Elysium inscribed onto it. The law requires every city to have this Stele erect at an easily accessible place.
